actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to redesign the $1 coin to commemorate Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
short_title: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., 1 Dollar Coin Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., 1 Dollar Coin Act - Requires the obverse and reverse sides, respectively, of the one dollar coin to have the likeness of, and a design emblematic of, Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

titles.title: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., 1 Dollar Coin Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to redesign the $1 coin to commemorate Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
